items.title: How Social Security has gotten worse under Trump
items.description: Customer service has deteriorated by key measures as the agency enacted sweeping cuts in Trump’s second term, internal data and interviews show.

items.title: Trump says U.S. destroyed loading dock in Venezuela
items.description: Trump would not say whether the military or the CIA conducted the strike in Venezuela amid escalating U.S. pressure on Nicolás Maduro.

items.title: Netanyahu, Trump project unity as Middle East tensions rise
items.description: Netanyahu has hailed Trump as the “greatest friend Israel has ever had in the White House.” Now the two must navigate rifts over Middle East strategy.
